title: Elegant New England Countryside Escape in the Heart of Woodstock
description:
Discover quintessential New England charm at Woodstock Inn & Resort, Vermont. Part of the prestigious Preferred Hotels & Resorts brand, this elegant property embraces the vision of Laurance and Mary Rockefeller, who established the original inn. Guests can enjoy a selection of cosy restaurants, including the award-winning The Red Rooster and Richardson's Tavern, and the seasonal Fairway Grill and Perley's Pourhouse. Hit the Athletic Club for a round of tennis, take a swing on the golf course, then visit The Spa for restorative treatments.

Explore the area's covered bridges, the Ottauquechee River, Quechee Gorge, Marsh-Billings-Rockefeller National Historical Park and surrounding picturesque New England countryside. A wonderful collection of country stores, boutiques, bookstores and art galleries line the village, enticing visitors to wander its charming streets. In winter, the area becomes a paradise for skiers and snow sports enthusiasts, who head to the family-friendly Saskadena Six Ski Area, which welcomes skiers and snowboarders of all abilities, or to the Nordic Center, which boasts more than 45 km of groomed trails.
